resources.string: To use app please install it, you can find it on the PlayStore
Enable / Disable subtitles.\nMake sure your the subtitle file is in the same folder as your video file and has the same name with the .srt extension.
Set the amount of seconds to be skipped when you tap either the Next or Previous button.
Set the playback speed of the video (It is reset to 1X when a new video is played).
